question: Question_03_(c)
statement:
\textbf{Short-Answer Question. Simplify your answer as much as possible
and show your work.}

Let $\displaystyle f(x) = \begin{cases}
cx^2 + 3 & \text{if } x \geq 1 \\
2x^3 - c & \text{if } x < 1
\end{cases}$

where \emph{c} is a constant. For what value of the constant \emph{c} is
the function \emph{$f$(x)} continuous on
$\displaystyle (-\infty, \infty)$?
